title: Food ordering web
description: A food ordering web that enables customers to view the menu, search dishes, order for delivery or pickup, pay through a local payment gateway, and keep track of the status of the order

title: Administration dashboard
description: A dashboard that allows administrators of the business to manage the products, categories, customers, orders, delivery areas, schedules and general preferences

title: Ecommerce Backend
description: An API that exposes several endpoints to communicate a postgresql database with both customers and administration apps.

title: Movies API
description: A challenge that I did in order to put in practice what I've learned about Node.js, Express and MongoDB, consist of a CRUD that let users manipulate movies

title: Mobile POS
description: Flutter application, that integrates with SambaPOS(a desktop POS) through their GraphQL API, it was one of my first personal projects
